Text:
Besides the fact that even demanding 720-movies does "improve" on viewing without pixelating or lagging, there may be one - but hardly noticeble - trade-off:

1) In movies where you SHOULD have expericenced lagging and pixelating, you may find colory shadows traveling along the screen for short period of times. However, that phenomenon is much preferable than the otherwise.

If you are not satisfied with the result, in Vlc:

1) Chose "Tools"
2) Chose "Settings"
3) Press the button "Restore Settings"

And voilÃ¡, yourÃ© back to normal state.

I'm running Windows 7 and I can't find the location specified in your readme txt:

C:\Documents and Settings\Yourwindowsaccountname\Application Data\vlc

Excuse my ignorance. Help clarify thanks.

If you cant find vlcrc on manual search, use the search function button on the top of every other folder (i.e. explorer or my documents).

Choose the "All files and folders" option, and search for vlcrc in C:.

Replace the found file with the one from this torrent.
